name: ecommerce-app
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with Next.js frontend and Express backend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "yellow,cyan" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "yellow,cyan" "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend

author: Fazlul Karim
